quote_first: Everybody was happy; everybody was complimentary; the ice was soon broken; songs, anecdotes, and more drinks followed, and the pregnant minutes flew. At
quote_last: , when the jollity was at its highest— BOOM! There was silence instantly.
quote_raw: Everybody was happy; everybody was complimentary; the ice was soon broken; songs, anecdotes, and more drinks followed, and the pregnant minutes flew. At six minutes to one, when the jollity was at its highest— BOOM! There was silence instantly.
title: A Double Barrelled Detective Story
author: Mark Twain
